name: Noche de Salsa
description:
This beautiful artwork features a night of dancing salsa under the stars in a Caribbean paradise. This artwork was recently selected to be on a digital CD cover for Fania Records. This will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

All images are available as a Poster, Matted Print, or Canvas Print (Allow extra time for ordering Canvas Prints)

Product description:

Poster:
Size: 18" x 24" including white borders around image.
Poster will be neatly rolled up, comes unframed and is shipped to you directly from the Artist.

Matted Print:
8x10 image in a 11x14 Matt - protected by a cello bag and shipped flat. 

Stretched Canvas Print:
Small: 8x10
Large: 16x20

Stretched Canvas Giclee Print - High Quality and Made to last.
Large:16x20

options.name: Large Giclee Print on Stretched Canvas 16x20

name: Salsa en la Playa
description:
This beautiful painting features a couple dancing a sexy salsa on the beach as the waves crash against the surf and the palm trees sway to the music. This image was recently selected to be on the digital cover for a Fania Records album. It will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

name: Spotlight Salsa
description:
A couple dances a sizzling salsa as the spotlight shines on them and roses lay at their feet. If you have ever dreamed or experienced performing on stage,  embrace your inner performer with this romantic artwork. It will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

name: Tango Cafe
description:
This painting brings a romantic cafe scene to life! Romance fills the air in an outdoor Buenos Aires cafe. Couples dine and dance the Argentine Tango. Diners watch as couples effortlessly cling to one another, their legs performing intricate footwork and hope for their turn on the dance floor. 
This artwork will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

All images are available as a Poster, Matted Print, or Canvas Print(Allow extra time for ordering Canvas Prints)

name: Drunk Illusions
description:
A man dreams up a fantasy woman appearing from the smoke of his cigar after a long night at the bar. His vision is doubled, but the only thing that is clear to him is this drunk illusion and the bottle. This surreal artwork is the perfect art to complement your home bar or living room. This will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

All images are available as a Poster, Matted Print, or Canvas Print(Allow extra time for ordering Canvas Prints)

name: Salsa y Guaguanco
description:
From the fields to the dance floor, salsa has evolved and keeps evolving. The heartbeat of the dance is the conga. Tu-ku-tun-pa!

This high quality artwork depicts the evolution and growth of salsa -- from the heartbeat of the conga, to the roots of the guaguanco, to blending with romantic European dances, and to performing on stage. It will come shipped to you directly from the Artist: Alla Gerzon (formerly Bespalov).

All images are available as a Poster, Matted Print, or Canvas Print(Allow extra time for ordering Canvas Prints)

Product description:
